references.paper_title: Analysis of a complex of statistical variables into principal components
references.reason: This paper is considered important because it introduces Principal Component Analysis (PCA), a foundational linear dimensionality reduction technique.
This paper presents t-distributed Stochastic Neighbor Embedding (t-SNE), a widely used non-linear dimensionality reduction method for visualization.

references.paper_title: Umap: Uniform manifold approximation and projection for dimension reduction
references.reason: This paper introduces Uniform Manifold Approximation and Projection (UMAP), another non-linear dimensionality reduction technique, known for its speed and ability to preserve both local and global data structure.

references.paper_title: A global geometric framework for nonlinear dimensionality reduction
references.reason: This paper introduces Isomap, a manifold learning technique for non-linear dimensionality reduction that preserves geodesic distances.

references.paper_title: Nonlinear dimensionality reduction by locally linear embedding
references.reason: This paper introduces Locally Linear Embedding (LLE), a manifold learning technique that preserves local linear relationships in the data.
